column5: We are going to Whitefish Bay on LOTW this Saturday. While spending most of our time on muskies, we will be taking a break and try for some lake trout. We are not setup with down riggers so will be jigging for them. I would appreciate any help you could pass along on baits to use, possible areas to try, and any techniques. We haven't fished for trout for about 10 years now and never on LOTW. Keep a tight line.
